overview: MAYBELINE a divorced woman, struggling to find herself, discovers her only sister SHARON (mother of 3 young boys), is terminally ill. MAYBELINE's life is turn upside down, as she takes on a role she never anticipated, fighting to save herself and the 3 young boys.  Director Shorni Hardy Writers Byron Griffin(script contributor)Shorni Hardy Stars Harriet BurnetteRyan Mock CurryPorsha Mills
title: My 3 Boys
